short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive notifications when your children's classes are about to begin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly setup desktop notifications alerting you when your children's classes are about to begin without having to clutter up your Calendar. 

Allows for multiple children, days and courses per day. Each class notification can be configured as to how many minutes prior to the start of the class to deliver the notification as well as how long for the notification to display before being automatically removed.

I hope you find it helpful. 

After install click Extensions -> Classminder -> Options to configure the days and courses for each of your children.

Note: Only tested in latest Chrome, at time of publish version 85.0.4183.102
